title: Card Pattern 01
summary: Card Pattern 01 is a pre-built composition based on the card component.
preamble: Card Pattern 01 provides a ready-to-use structure that combines image, text, and actions, with both default and linked interaction types. This ensures consistent layout, spacing, and accessibility while allowing flexibility through slots.

overview.title: Slots
overview.section-content:
All card patterns are built on top of the base card component.  
Card pattern 01 is available in both interaction types - default card and linked card, and uses slots to build flexible yet consistent layouts.

Each variant consists of:

*   **Header slot** - img, icon or custom.
    
*   **Main area** - includes heading and excerpt.
    
*   **Footer** slot Supports actions depending on card type (see below).

overview.title: Decorative elements
overview.section-content:
The footer supports two types of decorative elements: a label, set via the `label` property, and slotted elements, such as an icon button.

Note: On a linked card, all decorative elements are always inert.

overview.title: Empty
overview.section-content: The footer will not show if the card is linked without a label, or if no slotted elements are provided.

overview.title: Variants
overview.section-content: In Card Pattern 01, you can choose between two variants: `neutral-01` and `neutral-02`. The `neutral-02` variant can also be outlined.

columns.name: faq-cp01
columns.summary: How is the Card pattern 01 built in Figma?
columns.content: All components are built using nested card components and slot components. The default card and linked card are two separate base components in Figma. This separation makes it possible to apply and prototype states (like hover and pressed) on the linked version.

columns.name: faq-cp01
columns.summary: Should I edit the nested card inside a pattern?
columns.content: No. When using a Card pattern 01 component, you should not adjust any properties on the nested card itself. All changes should be made from the pattern-level properties and within the slot components. This ensures consistency and prevents conflicts between nested states or appearances.

columns.name: faq-cp01
columns.summary: What slot versions exist in Card pattern 01?
columns.content:
Each variant of Card pattern 01 is built using slot layouts that define how content areas are structured. Slots help you adapt the card to different content needs without unnecessary overrides or complex property toggles.

Here are the available slot versions:

*   Content only with footer - contains a heading, excerpt, and footer.â€¨Use for simple content without imagery or metadata.
    
*   Content with header and footer - includes an additional header slot above the text area for custom content.
    
*   Image as header, text and footer - adds an image area above the text block. Available in two aspect ratios: 16:9 (landscape) or 1:1 (square).
